description: {"blocks":[{"key":"63lsg","text":"Purpose: This protocol is intended for use in fixing human ovarian tissue in a research setting. This protocol supplements the steps detailed in the collection, processing, and long-term storage of human ovarian tissue as formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) samples in protocol: dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.e6nvwdk29lmk/v1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":283,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DF17842B2CAC11EE9E9A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.e6nvwdk29lmk/v1"}}}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ol40","text":"This protocol takes place under approved IRB protocol through Northwestern University (NU12G09) for collection of human ovarian tissue through Northwestern Medicine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3i4p2","text":"Researchers working with human specimens will adhere to all safety and training protocols required by the institution (Northwestern Medicine/Northwestern University) including but not limited to:    \n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qc9i","text":"Biosafety Certification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21mmm","text":"Bloodborne Pathogens Certification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nlcs","text":"Working with Formaldehyde Certification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3am07","text":"Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative (CITI program) certification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"51iat","text":"Modified Davidson’s Fixative, MDF (Electron Microscopy Sciences, 64133-50)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsarf","text":"Histology grade ethanol (Fisher Scientific 04-355-223)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vk65","text":"Invitrogen™ RNase-free Microfuge Tubes (ThermoFisher Scientific, AM12400)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"480bb","text":"Fill 1.5 mL micro centrifuge tube with 1 mL of Modified Davidson’s Solution (Cat. #64133- 50; Electron Microscopy Sciences, Hatfield, PA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4eii1","text":"Add one ovary wedge or all tissue pieces (ovarian explant) from one experimental well per 1.5 mL micro centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"88ihd","text":"Allow all tubes to rock @ room temperature (RT) for 2-4 hrs.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"em7nj","text":"Transfer tubes to cold room and rock at 4°C overnight (Fig. 1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"gugd","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40egr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3FA810802CAC11EE88493F1FCE853E11","height":153,"id":393241,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"ejsd0\",\"text\":\"Fig. 1. Ovarian tissue wedges resting on rocker at 4°C overnight (A). Ovarian tissue wedges are embedded in paraffin blocks so that the cortex and medulla will be present in every section (B). A representative tissue section is shown for the block in B which includes both cortex and medulla approximated by a black line (C). Ovarian explants from one tissue well can be embedded together so that they are sectioned in one plane (D).\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Fixation Fig. 1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/naa5b7bax.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/naa3b7bax.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/naa4b7bax.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/naa2b7bax.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5u7pb","text":"Wash in 1 mL 70% EtOH 3x10 minutes, rocking in between each, and then store in 70% EtOH @ 4°C until processing/paraffin embedding, no longer than 1 week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4n6jm","text":"Ovarian tissue wedges containing both cortex and medulla should be embedded so that the cortex and medulla will be sectioned in one plane (Fig. 1B). A representative H\u0026E tissue section indicates the proper orientation (Fig. 1C).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ovarian tissue fixation for fixed wedges and ovarian explant pieces
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3hplj","text":"Ovarian tissue pieces from explant culture should be embedded together, if cultured in the same well (Fig. 1D). While embedding try to ensure that tissues sit as evenly as possible, so that they are sectioned in the same plane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69k95","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Human ovarian tissue fixation
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"e3tto","text":"Researchers will wear personal protective equipment when working with human specimens, including gloves, masks, and lab coats.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
